profile.profileName: RWAHS - Royal Western Australian Historical Society
profile.profileDescription: Royal Western Australian Historical Society profile

label.name: Yes No list with Default of No
Yes No list with Default of Yes

label.name_singular: D: cm L: cm H: cm
label.name_plural: D: cm L: cm H: cm

label.name_singular: D: m L: m H: m
label.name_plural: D: m L: m H: m

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

label.name: Value
label.description: Amount advised by institution borrowing and insuring item.

label.name: Audit Seen
label.description: Add a new value for when this object was seen during an audit.

label.name: Other Number
label.description: Some items come marked with another number from an institution or in the museum records has received another number at some time.

label.name: Author(s)
label.description: Enter author names in the format "Smith, John"

label.name: Collation (Physical Description)
label.description: Enter the collation of the item. This replaces the legacy `Marks` field from CollectionsMosaic.

label.name: Current Location
label.description: Legacy data. Not shown on forms.

label.name: Restrictions
label.description: Legacy field not in library form.

label.name: Date Due
label.description: Legacy field not in library form.

label.name: Date Out
label.description: Legacy field not in library form.

label.name: Date Returned
label.description: Legacy field not in library form.

label.name: Volume Number
label.description: Legacy field not in library form.

label.name: Physical description
label.description: Includes type of image, dimensions, any other details.

label.name: Terms Of Use
label.description: Includes type of image, dimensions, any other details.

label.name: Date of movement
label.description: The date an object was moved from its current location.
